Package Student

Class Student

java.lang.Object
Login.User
Student.Student
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CampCommittee
public class Student extends User implements Serializable
Represents a student with registration and camp-related functionalities.
See Also:
